name: I Prayed for This Child
description:
I prayed for this child and the Lord has granted me what I asked of Him. 1 Samuel 1:27

CHILD is cheerfully colored due to children lighting up our worlds. Letters have a vintage/distressed look to them. Colors include gray, olive green, vintage pink, rusty red, sea blue-green, and mustard yellow.

This unique typography art print is printed on Ultra Premium Luster paper. Approximate text area is 7.5 inches by 6.5 inches. Overall size of the paper is 8.5 inches by 11 inches which gives a nice border for framing. It will be packaged in a clear sleeve and a sturdy document mailer for delivery.

Donated by Enduring Arts. All proceeds go directly to the family of the week featured on Give1save1.com

name: Michelle Armas Original
description: This is an original 24x24 inch painting by Michelle Armas, who painted it to raise funds for the Cupitt Family adoption. The colors are mostly magentas and oranges, but have a million beautiful colors mixed in there as well.
